toast.invalid_network: Network exception, please try again later
toast.data_too_large: The data is too large, not available for download
toast.maintenance: Please note that CKB Explorer will be under maintenance from {{start}} to {{end}}. Data update during the period might be delayed.

navbar.wallet_abc_description: A safe, user-friendly decentralized cross-platform wallet
navbar.wallet_bitpie_description: Bitpie is an industry-leading multi-blockchain (BTC/ETH/EOS/USDT etc.) wallet
navbar.wallet_cobo_description: Grow and protect crypto assets for everyone
navbar.wallet_hoo_description: A multi-assets blockchain wallet connected with Hoo exchange
navbar.wallet_imtoken_description: imToken is a feature-rich digital wallet to securely manage BTC, ETH, ATOM, EOS, TRX, CKB, BCH, LTC, and other digital assets
navbar.wallet_neuron_description: An open source project from Nervos Foundation, with local CKB node to achieve trustless services
navbar.wallet_renrenbit_description: A digital asset management platform offering 100% reserve

statistic.addresses_balance_group: Count of Addresses by Balance Group
statistic.addresses_below_specific_balance: Count of Addresses Below Specific Balance
statistic.address_count_description: The total number of unique addresses used on the blockchain.
statistic.block_time_distribution_description: The x axis is block intervals in seconds, and the y axis is the frequency of occurrence in the latest 50,000 blocks.
statistic.epoch_time_distribution_description: The x axis is epoch intervals in hours, and the y axis is the frequency of occurrence in the latest 500 epochs.
statistic.average_block_time_description: Average block intervals with daily & weekly smooth window
statistic.uncle_rate_description: The uncle rate is the rate of orphans blocks. The NC-Max consensus will automatically adjust the uncle rate by mining difficulty, and the target is 2.5%.
statistic.balance_ranking_description: The first 50 addresses that have the most amount of CKB.
statistic.balance_distribution_description: Shows the address count at specific balance range, and that under specific balance amount.
statistic.tx_fee_description: Total transaction fees charged by miners.
statistic.total_dao_deposit_description: Shows the total DAO deposit and depositors' address count.
statistic.deposit_to_circulation_ratio_description: The ratio of DAO deposit to circulating supply. Where the circulating supply is equal to the total supply minus the burnt part and the unvested part.
statistic.nominal_rpc_description: The nominal compensation rate provided by DAO when there is no burnt portion in the secondary issuance. The real compensation rate is always higher than the nominal compensation rate.
statistic.secondary_issuance_description: The secondary issuance is automatically divided into three parts, the compensation, the mining reward and the treasury (burnt by now). They are proportional to the DAO deposit, the storage occupation, and the rest of CKBytes.
statistic.inflation_rate_description:
Nominal inflation rate: the inflation introduced by the the primary issuance and the secondary issuance. 
Nominal APC: the anti-dilution compensation rate of Nervos DAO.
Real inflation rate: the compound inflation rate that nominal inflation rate minus the nominal APC, which is gradually to zero.

search.empty_result:
Opps! Your search did not match any record. 

Please make sure input contains only one of the following items:
search.empty_result_items: Block Number/ Block Hash/ Transaction Hash/ Address/ Lock Hash/ Type Hash
search.dao_filter_no_result:
Filter result not found.
Please enter only complete Transaction Hash or Address
search.udt_filter_no_result:
Filter result not found.
Please enter only complete Address

address.vesting_tooltip: There is a CKB vesting script embedded in genesis block, click to check the details
address.pending_reward_tooltip: The block reward and transaction fee of this block will be sent to the miner after 11 blocks，learn more from our Consensus Protocol

transaction.cellbase_help_tooltip: The cellbase transaction of block N is sent to the miner of block N-11 as reward, learn more from our Consensus Protocol
transaction.tx_rejected_reason: At least one input is invalid

block.pending_tip: The block reward of this block will be sent to the miner after 11 blocks，learn more from our Consensus Protocol
block.reward_sent_tip: The reward of this block has been sent, click to check the details

nervos_dao.deposit_address_tooltip: Number of addresses with non-zero balance of Nervos DAO

error.maintain: The site is temporarily down for maintenance. Please check back soon.

udt.unknown_token_description: The token’s information is incomplete. If you are the owner of this token, please submit token info.
udt.tokens_empty: There are no tokens at this time.
